DOC.brief_summary: This study open-label 6-week ( 30 session ) trial active repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) use fix frequency ( 10 Hz ) vary stimulation intensity use 3+3 study design safety tolerability amongst adolescent . This mean enroll 3 participant time give rTMS stimulation intensity energy 80 % motor threshold ( MT ) . If three participant complete 6 week treatment major safety event ( i.e . seizure ) , increase energy next 3 participant 5 % . If 1 3 participant major safety event , enroll 3 patient SAME energy . We proceed manner , increase 5 % 3 subject safely complete treatment energy , maximum energy 120 % motor threshold . If 2 participant intensity level cohort experience major safety event , discontinue run subject energy level . If happens initial energy level 80 % MT , stop study . If reach 2 event higher energy cohort , return previous energy level complete remainder subject energy level .
DOC.brief_title: Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Adolescent Depression : Efficacy , Predictive Biomarkers , Mechanisms
DOC.detailed_description: Adolescents Treatment Resistant Depression ( TRD ) ( n=30 ) recruit inpatient outpatient adolescent mental health clinical service UMN surround area . Adolescents parent undergo consent process initial clinical evaluation . This initial evaluation do use Kiddie Schedule Affective Disorders Schizophrenia ( K-SADS-PL 2009 ) Children 's Depression Rating Scale-Revised ( CDRS-R ) . Participants family also ask complete Antidepressant Treatment Report ( ATR ) , Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI-II ) , Columbia Suicide Severity Rating Scale ( C-SSRS ) , Inventory Depression Anxiety Symptoms ( IDAS ) , Temporal Experience Pleasure Scale ( TEPS ) , Snaith-Hamilton Pleasure Scale ( SHAPS ) , Young Mania Rating Scale ( YMRS ) , Edinburgh Handedness Scale , Weschler Abbreviated Scale Intelligence ( WASI ) Tanner Pubertal Staging Questionnaire . Participants also ask complete NIH Toolbox , Children 's Auditory Verbal Learning Test ( CAVLT ) , Delis-Kaplan Executive Function System ( D-KEFS ) Trail Making Test . Adolescents TRD fit inclusion/exclusion criterion ( presence major depression CDRS-R raw score > 40 ; history least one fail treatment trial antidepressant [ define Antidepressant Treatment Report ] ; history seizure disorder ; presence MRI contraindication [ e.g . claustrophobia metallic implant ] ) schedule : A . A baseline MRI ( describe ) B . 6 week series rTMS visit describe C. A post-treatment MRI D. A post-treatment clinical assessment ( blind treatment assignment ) E. 6 monthly follow visit In first rTMS visit , study physician fit cap , determine ideal location stimulation , measure MT MEPa . Adolescents receive 6 week rTMS , 20 minutes/day , 5 days/week administer trained technician . Active treatment 43 train 10 Hz , stimulation intensity vary describe , inter-train interval 20 second , 1680 pulses/session . A member research staff meet weekly patient complete CDRS-R , monitor treatment tolerance use Side Effects Form Children Adolescents , measure MT MEPa . Adolescents also complete BDI-II , C-SSRS-SLV , IDAS , TEPS , YMRS , SHAPS weekly . At week four , participant ask repeat NIH Toolbox , Children 's Auditory Verbal Learning Test ( CAVLT ) , Delis-Kaplan Executive Function System ( D-KEFS ) Trail Making Test . Scanning take place Center Magnetic Resonance Research 3T Siemens Prisma scanner baseline ( clinical assessment , first treatment ) last rTMS treatment . Participants complete MRI safety form provide urine sample rule substance use ( participant ) pregnancy ( female ) . A high-resolution T1 image collect ( voxel size=1mm isotropic ; TR=2530ms ; TE=3.65ms , T1=1100ms , flip angle=7° , 5 minute ) . Functional data acquire use Human Connectome Project ( HCP ) 38 multiband echo planar image sequence ( whole brain T2*-weighted functional volume , 72 contiguous slice ; TR=720ms ; TE=34.2ms ; flip angle=55o , FOV=212mm ; voxel size=2mm isotropic ; matrix=106x106 ; multiband factor=8 ; 12 minute ) rest eye open view fixation cross . Participants ask complete task fMRI present series visual stimulus , ( human face vary emotion expression positive , negative neutral word print face ) . During task , participant ask decide whether word print face positive negative regardless emotion face show . Each subject complete four distinct block task . After completion rTMS session , participant undergo final assessment ask meet evaluator complete CDRS-R . They also ask complete BDI-II , C-SSRS , TEPS , SHAPS , IDAS NIH Toolbox . After completion rTMS session , participant ask return see researcher every month 6 month assess length treatment response .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) A CDRSR score > 40 Experiencing current MDD episode duration ≥ 4 week ≤3 year Resistance treatment , defined failure respond adequately least one antidepressant treatment , define ATR level 14 current episode Both child parent/guardian English speak Female participant sexually active course study must use form birth control duration study Any subject clinically defined neurological disorder insult include , limited , condition likely increase risk seizure ; , space occupy brain lesion ; history seizure ; history cerebrovascular accident ; transient ischemic attack within two year ; cerebral aneurysm ; dementia ; brain surgery ; history stroke family history epilepsy Any subject increase risk seizure reason , include prior diagnosis increase intracranial pressure history significant head trauma loss consciousness ≥ 5 minute Positive response question Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Adult Safety Screening Questionnaire ( TASS ) Subjects cardiac pacemaker , implanted medication pump , intracardiac line , acute unstable cardiac disease Subjects conductive , ferromagnetic , magneticsensitive metal implant head within 30 cm treatment coil exclude mouth safely remove exclude . Examples include cochlear implant , implanted electrodes/stimulators , aneurysm clip coil , stent , bullet fragment , jewelry hair barrettes Subjects active inactive implant ( include device lead ) , include deep brain stimulators , cochlear implant , vagus nerve stimulators Inability locate quantify motor threshold define protocol History treatment ECT TMS therapy disorder Participation investigational drug trial within 4 week baseline visit Pregnancy IQ < 80 Clinically significant laboratory abnormality medical condition , opinion investigator would hinder subject complete procedure require study Suicide attempt within previous 6 month require medical treatment ≥2 attempt past 12 month , clear plan suicide state s/he guarantee s/he inform family member call his/her psychiatrist investigator impulse implement plan become substantial study ; , investigator 's opinion , likely attempt suicide within next 6 month Unstable psychotherapy ( therapy must least 3 month prior entry study , anticipation change frequency treatment focus therapeutic session duration study ) A diagnosis substance use disorder , Schizophrenia , Bipolar Disorder , Autism Refusal cooperate study procedure Recent change dose antidepressant medication ( within 6 week prior initial evaluation ) . This include antidepressant adjunctive psychotropic medication use address problem related mood anxiety ( e.g . antipsychotic medication , mood stabilizer . ) This include stimulant medication use treat Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD ) . ** Current treatment Bupropion dose great 150mg per day . Current treatment stimulant medication adjunct medication depression . *** Current treatment stimulant medication ADHD FDA recommend dosage . *** ( * ) If participant insufficient number trial current episode , participant must also fail ≥1 ≤4 trial previous episode . Subjects unable complete antidepressant trial adequate dose duration due intolerance antidepressant therapy may include demonstrated intolerance ≥4 antidepressant medication within one discrete illness episode ( current previous episode define ) ( ** ) If recent discontinuation medication require vary lapse time study entry depend medication type follow : Antidepressant medication = 4 week , mood stabilizer ( e.g . Lithium , Valproate ) = 2 week , Antipsychotic medication = 2 week , Stimulant medication = 1 week ( *** ) If participant treat stimulant medication adjunct strategy depression , require discontinue stimulant prior start study treatment wait 1 week begin study list . If participant take stimulant medication treat ADHD , allow continue stimulant medication , long dosage within FDA recommendation .
